text: "The Night They Drove Old Dixie Down" is a 1969 song by Canadian-American The Band and taken from their second studio album The Band. It is an A-side to their hit Up on Cripple Creek. ==Joan Baez version== The most successful version of the song belongs to Joan Baez. It was taken from her 12th studio album Blessed Are.... It went to number 3 in Canada and the United States, number 4 in New Zealand, number 5 in Australia, number 6 in the United Kingdom and number 8 in Ireland. ==References== Category:1969 songs Category:The Band songs Category:Joan Baez songs Category:Johnny Cash songs Category:Allman Brothers Band songs Category:Solomon Burke songs Category:Zac Brown Band songs Category:Country rock songs Category:Folk rock songs Category:Roots rock songs
title: The Night They Drove Old Dixie Down
